nodes.documentation: @title Escrow Factory. This should be a singleton in NUTS Platform.
nodes.name: EscrowFactory
createDepositEscrow
createInstrumentEscrow
createIssuanceEscrow

nodes.documentation: @title Escrow Factory. This should be a singleton in NUTS Platform.
nodes.name: EscrowFactory
createDepositEscrow
createInstrumentEscrow
createIssuanceEscrow

createDepositEscrow(address,address).details: Create new Deposit Escrow instance. Deposit Escrow has the same implementation as Instrument Escrow, but uses a different contract name to better distinguish their difference.

params.proxyAdmin: Admin of the proxy contract. Only proxy admin can change implementation.

createInstrumentEscrow(address,address).details: Create new Instrument Escrow instance. Note that all Instrument Escrows share the same implementation with data stored in proxy contract.

params.proxyAdmin: Admin of the proxy contract. Only proxy admin can change implementation.

createIssuanceEscrow(address,address).details: Creates new Issuance Escrow intance. Note that all Issuance Escrows share the same implementation with data stored in proxy contract.

params.proxyAdmin: Admin of the proxy contract. Only proxy admin can change implementation.

devdoc.title: Escrow Factory. This should be a singleton in NUTS Platform.
